title: BBC Art of Scandinavia 3of3 Democratic by Design 1080p x264 AAC
description:
Art of Scandinavia (BBC)

Arts Documentary hosted by Andrew Graham-Dixon, published by BBC in 2016 - English narration. 
http://docuwiki.net/images/0/01/Art-of-Scandinavia-BBC-Cover.jpg

Information
------------------------------
Andrew Graham-Dixon explores the history of Scandinavia through its art.

1)  Dark Night of the Soul 
Scandinavia, a land of extremes, on the edge of Europe. Andrew Graham-Dixon explores the extraordinary art to come out of the dark Norwegian soul, most famous for producing The Scream by Edvard Munch.

2)  Once upon a Time in Denmark 
In an epic journey through Scandinavian art and landscape, Denmark emerges from modest beginnings to become one of the greatest powers and arbiters of taste in northern Europe, a story of incredible transformation befitting the homeland of the greatest fairytale spinner of them all, Hans Christian Andersen, creator of The Ugly Duckling and The Emperor's New Clothes.

3)  Democratic by Design 
In the windswept journey through the art of the Norselands, we arrive in Sweden - home of IKEA and a tradition of brilliant furniture design stretching back to the early years of the 20th century. Sweden has made its modern democratic mission one of comfort and civilised living for the masses - but has it got there?
